attributes.action: Regulate the use of cannabis both medically and recreational within the uk
attributes.additional_details:
Is it really dangerous?
Compairing it to alcohol and tobacco then no its not, Cannabis related deaths remain very low if any at all where alcohol and tobacco is consumed by millions per day and is accountable for over 100,000 deaths combined a year while a drug that has medically, social and other vast uses remains illegal due to its effects what dont differ much from alcohol, we want to see a regulated cannabis market in the united kingdom in where we can access it legally or grow it at home.
attributes.background: It is estimated that around £1 Billion a year can be generated within the uk by taking the plant out of the hands of organised criminals who gain the profit and allowing it to be regulated safely where funding goes back into local communities.
